job.title: Systems Engineer
job.description: strongIT SYSTEMS ENGINEERstrongbrbrbrbrbrbrstrongJOB DESCRIPTIONbrstrongbrbrbrPrescient Solutions is an awardwinning Chicagolandbased IT outsourcer For more than 25 years we have been providing CIOlevel advisory support and onsite IT services to small midsized and global organizations and government entities We are committed to making our clients businesses run better by adding more value to their organizations through technology If you are looking for an opportunity to join a team where you can drive your career while being part of a company that values the ability to learn and grow this is your chance Prescient Solutions offers a great work environment that encourages teamwork to achieve a greater purpose while providing a higher level of service through better communication brbrbrbrWe are looking for a dynamic strongIT Sstrongstrongystems Engineer Administratorstrong who shares our commitment and believes in the value of communication and client interaction As a strongSystems Engineer  Administratorstrong you will establish maintain and provide the engineering direction needed to connect and configure Microsoft servers on enterprise networks You will also be responsible for working crossfunctionally across several clients enterprises between technology and the rest of their business to design and implement large scale solutions You will implement Prescient Solutions best practices and continually update skills and certifications to keep current with the most current technology brbrbrbrstrongIT SYSTEMS ENGINEER ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESstrongbrbrulbr	liSupports both operational and engineering functions at multiple client accounts concurrentlylibr	liEvaluates customer generated requirements and works with the clients to ensure the implementation meets the clients needslibr	liWorks with technicians and engineering groups at both Prescient Solutions and at the client locations to troubleshoot and resolve issues as requiredlibr	liPrepares operational and technical documentationlibr	liTroubleshoots and maintains clients infrastructures 247 andlibr	liPerforms other duties and assists with special projects as neededlibrulbrbrbrbrstrongREQUIREMENTSstrongbrbrulbr	liTechnical expertise including proficiency in Microsoft Server operating systems Office365 Active Directory and Microsoft Exchange server mastery of Microsoft Desktop Operating Systemslibr	liKnowledge of system securitylibr	liExcellent communication skills both verbal and writtenlibr	liProfessional and personablelibr	liAttention to detaillibr	liAbility to balance priorities and shift quicklylibr	liAbility to take ownership of area and follow assigned tasks through to successful completionlibr	liSelfmotivatedlibr	liClient Service Excellencelibr	liProblem Solving Skillslibr	liTime Managementlibr	liFlexibility and organizational skills to manage multiple clients IT infrastructures concurrentlylibrulbrbrbrbrstrongEDUCATION  CERTIFICATIONstrongbrbrulbr	liMicrosoft certification or equivalent experience orlibr	liMinimum of five years of experience with MS systems administrationliul
